author: Shambhavi Rai
text: If you'll share your deepest darkest secrets with someone whom you find trustworthy, THEY WILL throw it at your face in an argument. No matter how close they are, this thing is inevitable. ✌🏻

author: Shambhavi Rai
text: When we visit our years old posts, they make us cringe at our own choice of words/photos/opinions/knowledge regarding something. But if we don't cringe at that, how will we know if we have outgrown our past self?

author: Shambhavi Rai
text: On days people just remind you why you shouldn't open up to them because the people closest to your heart know exactly where to hit. 🌻

author: Shambhavi Rai
text: What is with the lethargy and the unproductivity!? I think the only thing I can blame it on is this summer. 👀

author: Shambhavi Rai
text: Sometimes I wonder if people make fake IDs to stalk others on twitter like they do on instagram or not..? 🤔

author: Shambhavi Rai
text: Have such a striking personality that your haters can't stop talking about you or mentioning you in literally anything they do. 😌

author: Shambhavi Rai
text: If you dated a guy who bad mouthed you just for the sake of becoming a hero in the eyes of some other girl, be grateful it ended, he didn't deserve you. Period. ✌🏻

author: Shambhavi Rai
text: It's best to permanently delete them from your life.

author: Shambhavi Rai
text: Some people are like anchor, even if they have not been in touch with you for a long time, once they come back and they are literally not doing anything but just staying in your life, talking to you, you feel like you are being dragged in the past.

author: Shambhavi Rai
text:
People crying over not having good friends, Umm... Girl, maybe it's because you are a two faced cu*t and you literally talk shit about everyone behind their backs. 🤷🏾‍♀
Kabhi socha hai? 🤷🏾‍♀

author: Shambhavi Rai
text: Be very careful how people talk around you regarding other people, because that is the exact same way THEY will talk about YOU behind your back, to them.

author: Shambhavi Rai
text: The peace of mind you get after cutting toxic people off. 😌

author: Shambhavi Rai
text: Delete that contact, delete all those chats, remove them from your friend list, block them. Delete any screenshots you have kept of them that makes you question removing them from your life. It's high time you realize your worth and understand that your time is precious.

author: Shambhavi Rai
text: Honey most of the times you're just bored not lonely. No need to talk to those people who never initiate a conversation on their own.

author: Shambhavi Rai
text: I don't know who needs to hear this but DON'T call / message that "friend" who doesn't call / message you like ever, and never tries to initiate a conversation or reach out to you, to check up on you on their own. Stop watering dead plants!

author: Shambhavi Rai
text: Removed so many people from my Snapchat yesterday! Damn I didn't even know most of them. Now I got barely 20-30 people. It's still a lot. I don't even use the app. I hate it! 😭

author: Shambhavi Rai
text: The S in my name stands for: sassy, smart, sexy, strong, sagacious, sardonic and special.

author: Shambhavi Rai
text: Adulting is actually realizing that your mom IS in fact your best friend and the ONLY one who'll not do baat edhar ka udhar, rest all are just 🐍.

author: Shambhavi Rai
text: When I was a kid, I had a habit of rolling my eyes and to stop me from doing that, my mom told me that "If you'll keep doing this, your eyes will get stuck." so obviously I stopped. But mom, I have an even worst attitude now so like.....? 🤷🏾‍♀😀

author: Shambhavi Rai
text: It's National Poetry Month. Time to add more pressure on my brain and more stress in my already messed up life. Thrilled. ✌🏻

author: Shambhavi Rai
text: From where are these people getting brown parents who are supportive of their love life!? Like WTF? Hum he galat jaga pe hain kya?

author: Shambhavi Rai
text:
What tf is this life!?
I really want to read my tbr novels and I'm not getting the time!! Where is my "acchey din"!?

author: Shambhavi Rai
text:
How tf are all these people my age, going on night rides and having all these adventures!? 
The only adventure I'm having at night, is leaving my bed to go and get cold water from fridge.

author: Shambhavi Rai
text:
It's annoying and comforting at the same time, knowing that the teachers who bullied you in school are finally paying for their sins because some kids finally spoke up and their parents believed THEM and not the abuser (teacher). 
I wish this happened at our time.

author: Shambhavi Rai
text: How sad is this that when we were young and in school, our teachers bullied us for such minor problems and some of us are still carrying the trauma of it. How if we would have known better THEN, we won't have let any of that happen to us.

author: Shambhavi Rai
text: If only people understood the most basic thing that their outer beauty doesn't mean sh*t until and unless they are beautiful from the inside. 🤷🏾‍♀

author: Shambhavi Rai
text: I wish people were like pimples : constant in my life. 😌

author: Shambhavi Rai
text:
I'm sorry but I can't be friends with you, if you are friends with the person who hurt me. Call it whatever you want, but I gave you a choice and you made it. 
This double faced character traits don't work with me. 🤷🏾‍♀

author: Shambhavi Rai
text:
Happy Poetry Day to those who type like this -
"What yuhh doin?"
"Waahh dhaa fukk"
"I lyk myslf"
"Imma gotta do it"

Thoda time nekal k mar jao.😀

author: Shambhavi Rai
text: One of the worst feeling is calling a guy "brother/bro/bhai/bhaiya" without any feeling of brotherly affection towards him, just so he doesn't flirt with you.

author: Shambhavi Rai
text: Don't worry about not having enough followers, I have seen stupid pages with nonsense stuff having followers in thousands. It doesn't make your work any less important. You have no idea what difference it makes in someone's else's life. Keep up the good work. ♥

author: Shambhavi Rai
text: Happy World Poetry Day to all the beautiful artists who don't get the much deserved recognition, have small accounts / less number of followers and are struggling to keep up with stupid algorithms meanwhile striving and working really hard to put their best work out there.♥

author: Shambhavi Rai
text: Happy World Poetry Day to all the self proclaimed writers, the ones who make tonnes of grammatical errors, use cliches on a regular basis, use forced rhyming scheme, have below average composition skills and still are very arrogant while being so ignorant about this art. 😌

author: Shambhavi Rai
text: Dude I have literally saved so many people from getting their relationships/friendships destroyed by not ratting them out!! Like SO MANY!! 😂😂

author: Shambhavi Rai
text:
So I judged a National level Microtale competition. 😌✨ 

https://t.co/o2kboluUDt https://t.co/EvEN1CGQUJ

author: Shambhavi Rai
text: Okay so the level of detachment and IDGAF attitude that I have now >>>>>>>

author: Shambhavi Rai
text:
Hmm so I've noticed that people who are "iPhone users" have more followers. Why though? 🤔 
Unmey aisa kya laga hai jo android users me nahi hai? 🤔 🤷🏾‍♀

author: Shambhavi Rai
text: If I lost respect for you once, there's no going back. Period.✌🏻

author: Shambhavi Rai
text: "B*tch you come in my way, I'll f*cking destroy you" is the kind of attitude that is driving me through life now and I'm actually kinda loving it. 😂😌

author: Shambhavi Rai
text: It feels so liberating when after enduring a lot of trauma, you finally call people out on their bullsh*t that caused it. 😌

author: Shambhavi Rai
text: Men be like "I really like you" and then go ahead and date fifty other women. 😌

author: Shambhavi Rai
text: Well I am flexing then 😌 https://t.co/XWRr3mmf34 https://t.co/zuVEcZiGOQ

author: Shambhavi Rai
text: I hate rain and I do NOT understand how people can find it romantic. It just gets on my nerve and rainy days are just gloomy. Also unhygienic and insects all around. 😑

author: Shambhavi Rai
text: Funny when people thought it was safer than whatsapp. 😂

author: Shambhavi Rai
text:
Telegram is a risky app and day by day I'm getting really annoyed and tired of it. People are pulling all kinds of sh¡t there. Also what is with "delete messages for both the parties", "edit message" and "saving someone's message" !? 
It's only good for downloading movies/series.

author: Shambhavi Rai
text:
It's good for stupid conversations that you don't want to remember or don't want someone else to see.
THAT'S IT!
There. I said it. 😌

author: Shambhavi Rai
text:
FFS don't send me snaps on Snapchat! I don't even like the concept of it. The only thing it's good for, is messaging because:
1) Messages will vanish after 24 hours.
2) If someone takes a screenshot, you'll know.

author: Shambhavi Rai
text:
Maturity is realizing that all your facebook posts in the beginning were trash and you no longer know that person.
Deleting them is mandatory for a peaceful existence. 😌

author: Shambhavi Rai
text:
I hate it when people think and pretend that they know me better than I know myself. 
No B*tch! You don't know sh*t!

author: Shambhavi Rai
text:
One of the best things I've learned in a while is that do NOT open up to people. They really don't care. 
Everyone is busy with their own sh*t  or busy in making up and spreading sh*t about someone else. ✌🏻
